respStmt.resp: converted to this format, annotated and lemmatised by

publicationStmt.p: Published as supplementary material for the article Quantitative stylistics disproves the theory that Molière had ghostwriters.

sourceDesc.p: Transformed and annotated version of the edition digitised by Paul FièvreThéatre Classiquehttp://www.theatre-classique.fr/ parsed with TXM, and enriched with lemmata, POS and morphological annotation. Only the content of the characters' lines are kept.

bibl.title: Lemma from Morphalou, enriched with missing entries by J.B. Camps, F. Cafiero, S. Gabay
